data.description: The Product Engineer Intern is responsible for providing documentation to manufacturing to produce refrigeration products. This will require the structuring and routing of bills of material, coil sizing, refrigeration system design, wiring schematic development and component selection. Duties will also include supporting the shop floor with any drawing interpretation or guidance required, provide any work instructions and support lean manufacturing improvements for the production line. This position also drives the Safety, Quality and Continuous Improvement efforts, in conjunction with the supervisor. This position will serve our HTPG Division, located in Scottsboro, Alabama. Summer/Fall 2026
